title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
content: This my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 02, 2023, 08:33:24 AMThis my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own.  you done make me go check my balance wetin no nice. Well, I never see any alert and I done even try to check on face book if I go see person when done drop similar claim but I never see am.Let's assume that this is true, My few questions regarding this are,1.  What criteria was used to selecting the household that the said 25k would be given to and when was the selection done?2. If a government is giving it citizen a renewed hope, is it through a policy like this or won't it be better you use this money to train people to becoming skilled at something so they can be of help to themselves. Mind you, that 25k isn't even enough to take care of an adult for two weeks in this current economy.3.  Where is my own share of the money?   thus is the most important question they have to answer because that 25k go really help my life this morning.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on December 02, 2023, 08:50:40 AMLet's assume that this is true, My few questions regarding this are,1.  What criteria was used to selecting the household that the said 25k would be given to and when was the selection done?2. If a government is giving it citizen a renewed hope, is it through a policy like this or won't it be better you use this money to train people to becoming skilled at something so they can be of help to themselves. Mind you, that 25k isn't even enough to take care of an adult for two weeks in this current economy.3.  Where is my own share of the money?   thus is the most important question they have to answer because that 25k go really help my life this morning.I was told that some people have collected theirs. Let me repeat myself again, I was told. I have not seen anyone close to me directly that received anything. I have not filled any form to be eligible for it.Make more research, but this is the form one of my relatives gave me some weeks ago for it: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSciS7DW25pLiZaz-y_YhUAGZUoKM-V2-Whi2r46NTMdya5gsw/viewform?usp=sharingThis are also included on the WhatsApp message that I got it from: Quote25,000  program for 3 months.Let's try to do it,You will be asked this 1- Tenant2- LandlordWhichever one you choose is right, but the 1st one is okThe cost is 75,000 for 3 months which is  25,000 per month.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 02, 2023, 08:33:24 AMThis my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own. This is too good to be true. Its been long I see something like this. Should we call it Grace or miracle? Even though this is not sustainable,  it will go a long way in supporting people at least for the mean time while they think of other ways of making a living. This intervention will really caution the effect of our sad economic reality. The only problem is that the number of people that will benefit from this will be so insignificant compared to our population.  I don't know if there was announcement during the application period but I was never aware of it. This is how information fly and one will only know when it's late. Abeg if the application is still open, tell us because plenty people need this money.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: This nah beta thing but I never receive my own. Although I don hear when govt bin say them go give #30k to each house hold but e be like say them don reduce am. Most people go appreciate this act but my consan be say nah how many people go receive this one? Wetin we wan call this one? Palliative? Relief? Wetin them wan relieve if I may ask? The cost of living or wetin? E don tey wey we don dey ask for empowerment of the citizens from them and now this? For their mind them don do something..as the money no go finish bah? This we country nah cruise..

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Na wa oo, all this naija free money dem, person no dey ever chop am sef. This is somehow strange to me and I mean this particular update oo, but I believe there some few one that I participated but didn't receive any thing from the government but other that I introduced were all credited. The program was something like RRR payment of 5k for 6months and all the Payment was made once and it was 30k credited. This one I haven't heard about and am just making research now and finding out that it's true. Omo make I still dey wait na, MIRACLE NO TIRE JESUS

comments.author: Miles2006
comments.body: This one na good development even if the money is not enough for this kind time at least half bread is better than non, na the first time I dey see person receive government money, all the application wey people dey fill for my area say free money go come no dey come, sometimes na fadama, na fadama I dey mostly hear, the fadama na for farmers and when the form come people go fill their personal information and account number but I never hear say money come so I dey surprise, the matter dey hard to believe. I like the development sha, but no be everybody go  receive this money just like me wey no hear about the cash transfer, and most of this government workers with the form will not share it rather na their relative or friends, money like this no dey reach everybody

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 02, 2023, 08:33:24 AMThis my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own. This is a good development from our government. I no say the money is not big compared to the high cost of living in Nigeria but, at least the money will solve small issues for the people who receive it. All this free free money no dey even touch me self, sha make I go check all my account first. Op, please you fill any form before they pay you this money?

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 02, 2023, 08:33:24 AMThis my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own. Omo no be small thing oo , see as many people dey get joy for my area base on this update wey come this December, so many people don receive this money and them they get joy watin no good for my area and everyone dey surprised how come e take happen but everyone still dey surprised because them no actually fill any form of any sought and still they were credited this free money. Bad as e bad this one don give people joy small even sey the money no big but at least it's still something that is worth enjoying.

comments.author: Su-asa
comments.body: As I dey so, I never receive this kind of free money before but I see some people for my place dey shout say them done recive miraculous alert and I done still see the same thing for this place, abi nah only me na never recive this free money?E get as e be oo, but thank God sha as now nah celebration season, at least plenty people dey when no get money to use celebrate am, so as this small one come them go fit manage am although.No matter say this 25k nah Small money, but bad as e bad, e go still go a long way for many people, besides I go fit talk am say no body way recive this money been expect am, so as e dey so... Joy dey some areas because of this free money and the one way make am sweet pass be say them talk say the payments na for 3 good months but if incase say next month own no come, self e no mean as e be sat nah free thing.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: After I read it here which is the first time, a family friend posted it on his WhatsApp status he said he also received the money and he put a link to fill the form. Well I have filled the form after scrutiny that I don't have to enter a BVN or NIN or even upload an ID. Right now we wait. What troubles me about the form is, I was expecting that since it is coming from the Federal Government who would not fill a Google form but a customized form. There is no measure to ensure that you cannot fill the form more than once.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on December 02, 2023, 09:48:52 AMI was told that some people have collected theirs. Let me repeat myself again, I was told. I have not seen anyone close to me directly that received anything. I have not filled any form to be eligible for it.Make more research, but this is the form one of my relatives gave me some weeks ago for it: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSciS7DW25pLiZaz-y_YhUAGZUoKM-V2-Whi2r46NTMdya5gsw/viewform?usp=sharingThis are also included on the WhatsApp message that I got it from: Is there anywhere else we can verify this link? It would be helpful if you could provide me with a link to a government website so I can be sure I am not sending my details to the wrong person. Everyone should have the right to earn the 25k

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: DaNNy001 on December 02, 2023, 10:43:36 AMNa wa oo, all this naija free money dem, person no dey ever chop am sef. Make them no dey stress stress people unnecessarily, fill fill don too much at the end of the day dem go pay some and the officials go collect others. People don lose hope for the way dem dey run government for Nigeria. Me I no even know say dem dey feel form.Wetin dey make government no dey go through a simple process wey be BVN. Them get people account number including phone number, why dem go still dey ask to feel form wey be say if you no be party supporter or you no get big person as insider your form no go go through.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 02, 2023, 08:33:24 AMThis my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own. Dis one surprise me ooo, I hear people dey talk about am, but me I know believe am, I see person even upload the link wey u go use apply for status, but me I sabi my naija people now, dey go wan use any slight opportunity wey dem get do people anyhow na y I no just click the link. It’s really a nice one but I know say na just few people go get the money, na still another opportunity for our politicians to steal money. Me I never receive ooo, but I don’t know if you applied or you just come see money for your account? I go like make you share the steps wey u take wey u use get the money, so that others go fit follow am also.

comments.author: Africolo
comments.body: Some actions and inactions from the government need not be applauded. Most Nigerians applaud policies that will not favour citizens or bring light to the country. Sending 25k to households for three months in my wisdom will not eradicate poverty or better the living standard of the people. How many households will receive this money? How many square meals will it provide for families? Is this a definition of renewed hope? If senators or other government functionaries are giving such money will they applaud the government? The way to bring hope is by creating employment and that will automatically bring hope to the populace.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 02, 2023, 08:33:24 AMThis my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own. This is not what Nigerians want be sending this money to millions of Nigerians it won't solve the problem we are facing right now . What the citizens need from our leaders is not money  but if they can make the price of fuel to come down and the price of food to come down, this what I want. This money wey dem dey send to people ns money wey go finish at the spot because the money no get value again.  Make government try do something wey go give us better joy, no be all this things wey dem do.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 02, 2023, 08:33:24 AMThis my discussion no dey related to crypto currency but as e stance so, e dey related to politics one kind. First of all, this morning as I wake up I receive credit alert of N25k, when I see am I just dey confused wether nah somebody way I know nai send me the money, but when I ask the person way dey always put money for my account, em say no he him, then I con go browse about the RENEWEDHOPE cc because nah the name way show.Finally finally I con know say nah free money way presido TINUBU share to many households and nah for 3 months e go last. So I know know if you self way dey read this post wether you done recive your own. Although I never know if na true or not because I no received anything. But for me I no see any need of becoming happy about that because that one na another strategy to make Nigeriana silent over some certain things. We get more problem to tarcle dan shearing money. Our country don owe plenty Dept and we dey even think when we go pay this dept finish now we come hear say Dem dey shear money, so where de money dey come from?I think no be every thing person sopos to dey happy for. Because for me I see am as a way to silent the youth over their agetation on bad governance. One problem our leaders dey get na lack of planning. There are things them need settle before them go wan leave the live like oyibo;1) them sopos settled Dept wey we dry owe all over the world2) settle lecturers make them get moral to teach effectively, without depending on student for survival due to sorting. And e go reduce the rate of strike in our universities.3) civil servant wey dey complain say government no dey gree pay Dem as e sopos be. 4)use those money create production rather consumption.If you check out you go see say the problem we dey face na lack of production dey worry us. Nigeria get large portion of land wey sopo make we dey produce agricultural product but we leave am dey go inport rice they make life more difficult for human being.Wetting me I fit talk be say that money no frick me, because the money go still finish and we go still remain were we dey. It's better make person invest for my future, Dan giving me what will not add value to my life.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Omor na wa oo, ever since I dey hear of this kind of free money I never one day receive any one, how una take dey run am pass na? Make una share update oo, the only ones wey I fill form one time say dem go pay money, dem no gree pay and since that time if I see any form wey people dey fill say na federal government I dey ignore am. Though for my side I never hear anybody talk about money like this wey government send for this period oo. Anyway sha op congratulations for this update wey you get at least e go reach you buy data for phone.

comments.author: Jamestown70
comments.body: Omo me I no receive o I no get the hands on time and I been dey doubt say Dem go even pay sef I commend the fv for this initiative I hope Dem go continue to do something like this because the hardship for we country naija no be here again make I correct you this one no be politics this na something wey concern the whole country so e no bad as you the tell us for here

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: I didn't receive this alert, but I have confirmed from clos friend who showed me his alert of the this free money . Even the COVID 19 free funds when people were receiving, I didn't receive it. Probably I am not lucky for this federal government conditional cash transfer. In the COVID 19 time I did all the registration to get the 30k cash but all was vanity so I had to let it go so the subsequent ones I deliberately leave it so I didn't register for this one.
